name: Jules Cohen
backstory: I came to the Netherlands when I was 1 years old. My father thought it would be saver for us there. He was a true European. Spoke 4 languages, made himself understood in many more. Europe never loved him back enough. Met my mother in a theatre in Brussels, I guess they made do well enough. When Germany invaded the Netherlands I was 13. My parents had send me  to England days prior. I never saw them again.
